}}'''''Angbands Schmieden''''' is the first track of the album [[Dol Guldur (album)|Dol Guldur]] by the band [[Summoning]]. The song name is taken from [[Angband]], the citadel originally constructed by [[Morgoth|Melkor]] in the earliest days of the world as an outlying fortress to his northern stronghold of [[Utumno]]. The title is in German and translates to ''"Forges of Angband"'' in English.
